name: Immigrant Legal Services
description: CARECEN provides high quality, low-cost and pro-bono immigration legal services to low-income Latino immigrants and their families. CARECEN helps with DACA and Naturalization consultations, assistance with VAWA and/or U-VISA applications. Other Services Provided: - Legal Consultation - Processing of Documents & Applications - Legal Representation in Immigrant Court & USCIS - Know Your Rights Education - And Many More!!!!

howToGetIt: How to schedule a Consultation with the Immigration Legal Services Team at CARECEN SF To schedule a legal consultation, please call our main office Monday – Friday, 9am — 11am. Call our main office at (415) 642-4400 and dial “0” to speak with our receptionist and ask for a legal consultation. In case we are not able to answer your call, please leave a voicemail with the following information: Full Name Phone Number Brief explanation for your call Repeat your message twice Our Legal Team will reach out as soon as possible. We ask that you be patient as we receive a high volume of calls.
